title: Remote Control
name: remote-control
description: Remote control the browser via a socket.
author: Robert Xiao

preferences.name: localhostOnly
preferences.title: Listen on localhost only
preferences.description: If true, accept connections from localhost only. If false, accept connections from anywhere (may be insecure!).

preferences.name: port
preferences.title: TCP port number to listen on
preferences.description: Which TCP port number the server should listen on.

preferences.name: activeTab
preferences.title: Send commands to active tab
preferences.description: If true, commands are sent to whichever tab is active. If false, commands are only sent to the tab in which remote control was activated.

preferences.name: autostart
preferences.title: Start automatically with Firefox
preferences.description: If true, remote control is activated as soon as Firefox starts.
